channel.title: [3ds Max] Work
channel.description:
Here is my projects I will be working on. These are made with 3DS MAX and its only the trial. To test it out.
First:
[img]http://i20.tinypic.com/vxhr2t.png[/img]
Glasses with walls to show the reflection.
Comment
Thanks

item.title: [3ds Max] Work
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

All the glasses look like they’re filled to the brim. Unrealistic.

Soften the shadows a bit. They look ridiculous.

Get some better textures, the walls look like plastic.

Otherwise, good job.

Read full topic

item.title: [3ds Max] Work
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:3, topic:157210”]Atleast, yano, you can help him on improving it instead of sounding like an idiot.

GG

Sick of Anus[/quote]
By pointing out what sucks, that is telling him what he needs to improve. Seeing as I have never used the program myself, I cannot tell him exactly how to improve it.

Also, “yano”, you could be a good GM and not insult the members

Read full topic

item.title: [3ds Max] Work
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Thanks, yeah this was my first actual thing I did with 3ds max and just got it yesterday. So any ideas on how to improve would be great.

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic

Glasses are ok,but the shadows are just horrid.

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:2, topic:157210”]Reflection sucks, glasses suck, shadows suck, angle sucks, lighting sucks.[/quote]Atleast, yano, you can help him on improving it instead of sounding like an idiot.
